Title: Manmubang
Actors: Dong-hwi Jang, Yun Jeong-hie, Hyeong-il Kim
Plot: Based on Oh Yu-kwon's novel, A Mountain Hut In No-Man's Land, in which a woman helps two men who seek refuge in her humble mountain home at the start of the Korean War. However, her generosity and kindness leads to her losing her ...
